column2: "You can call me Stooky! You've been hopin' to see me, right? Well listen up, I need your help with somethin'!"

"I've been pickin' up on this, like, tense feeling in the air around here. Go here, do this, fight that thing...
I mean, like, we're basically bein' treated like errand-boys, right?"
"So I've got a plan to lift the mood by bringin' the boom! I'm talkin', like, primo fireworks. And I want everyone to see 'em, so I'm gonna set 'em off right here."
"Photons? Nah, nah. These are gonna need, like, a LOTTA gunpowder. I've heard about you. They say you can get your hands on, like, ANYTHING."
"How's about you lend me a hand? Alright, I knew I could count on you! Lookin' forward to seein' ya in action."
